Chapter 9: Exercise 1
=====================

```{r 1}
x1 = -10:10
x2 = 1 + 3 * x1
plot(x1, x2, type="l", col="red")
text(c(0), c(-20), "greater than 0", col="red")
text(c(0), c(20), "less than 0", col="red")
lines(x1, 1 - x1/2)

text(c(0), c(15), "greater than 0")
```
